title: WTT: My T205 Downey Sovereign for your Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Downey Sovereign for your Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody interested in a trade?  I'm looking for T205/T206 Sovereigns, and have a few to trade, including this Thomas Downey.  Let me know if you want to see my current list of all my trade bait!

Take Care,
Geno
